#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Convince Your
#Text=Parents to Get You a Pet if You Already Have Many
#Text=Everyone 's been there -- that moment when you 're browsing the Internet and you come across a video of some lucky duck that owns a guinea pig , rat , dog , or something else .
#Text=You instantly want one , and the quest to convince our parents begins ! But ... you already have a Fido or a Priscilla .
#Text=Follow this guide to help convince your parents anyway !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Research thoroughly .
#Text=Although this is a given , you must be prepared to show off in front of your parents and impress them with your extensive knowledge .
#Text=Not to mention , if you give improper care to your pet , it will be unhappy and mean .
#Text=This wo n't make anyone happy .
#Text=Prepare your information in a report- but be ready to answer any questions !
#Text=Also , be sure to say anything that will indicate that the pets you already have will not affect your new furry-or feathered- friend .
#Text=Cats are a very controversial topic , especially if you 're getting a smaller pet .
#Text=If you have a cat , try to convince your peers that your new pet will be far from danger .
#Text=If you 're asking for a bigger pet , such as a dog , try to come up with strategies to prevent conflict between the two .
#Text=Try to be as responsible as possible .

#Text=Make some kind of deal with with your parents ; for example , if you keep your room clean and do all the things a perfect angel child will do , they 'll consider getting you a pet . #*Never explicitly say , " Get me a pet .
